title: Educator K9-800 K9 Handler Professional E-Collar Dog Training Collar with Remote - Up to 1 Mile Range, Waterproof, Rechargeable, 100 Stimulation Levels, Vibration, Tone, 33-Inch Bungee Collar
features: Professional Remote Dog Training Collar - The K9-Handler e-collar for dog training has 100 adjustable levels of correction, vibration, and tone for Pavlovian conditioning. The 1 mile range is ideal for parks, hunting & field training.
Safety First - Unique safety lock-and-set feature safeguards against accidental stimulation level changes. The dog training collar comes with a built-in LED light for nighttime visibility.

Smarter Ways to Train Your Dog - Our professional electric dog collar for medium and large dogs comes with a 33" long by 1" wide bungee strap for added elasticity and comfort. Fits dogs 15+ lbs with necks 10" - 22".
Unique Features - Unlike other remote dog trainer collars, our remote transmitter and electronic dog collar are both waterproof, and the remote even floats in the water.
Assembled in the USA - K9-800 system is so rugged that we stand behind it with the full 2-year warranty. USA-based customer support is standing by to answer all your questions.
description: Professional E-Collar K9-800 remote dog training system comes with a time-tested receiver collar and next-generation stopwatch-shaped remote transmitter. With intuitive controls, you can keep your eyes on the dog and deliver fast, effective corrections. Send remote vibration taps, audible tones, and static stimulation in quick nicks or constant bursts.  The remote is easy to read, comfortable to hold, and a breeze to use. The flush-mounted buttons keep critical controls at your fingertips for a fast response. The patented "lock-and-set" safety feature gives you peace of mind and prevents accidental stimulation level change. Confirm the static level and training mode on the LCD screen for total control and confidence.   Slip the comfy e-collar on your best friend, grab the remote, and begin the training today.  The E-Collar K9 Educator remote features: - Up to 1 mile range (1760 yards) - 100 - Levels of Static Stimulation - 60 - Boost Stimulation Levels - Vibration - Pavlovian Tone - LCD Screen - Fully Waterproof - Rapid 2-Hour Charging  The ergonomic smart-trainer receiver collar: - Lightweight - LED night light - Rugged and impact resistant - Best fits dogs that are 15-lbs and up with necks 10 - 22 inches - 33-inch long by 1-inch wide biothane bungee comfort strap thatâ€™s ready to be cut to size  We stand behind our product with a 2 full year warranty. Parts and accessories are made in South Korea and are assembled right here in the USA.  Box Contents: - Remote transmitter - One collar receiver with black bungee strap - Charger - Lanyard - Belt Clip - Three sets of contact points (5/8 inch & 3/4 inch Standard, and 3/4 inch Thick Coat) - Carrying Case - PetsTEK training clicker - Owners manual
